alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 05 at 11:19AM PST until February 05 at 10:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected.After a lull in the snow this morning, ann additional 2 to 4 inches of snow is expected this afternoon and tonight. Winds gusting in excess of 40-50 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes. * WHEN...until 10 PM PST tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County
